modele.occupant.objetMobile

Class Sage

  • java.lang.Object
    • modele.occupant.Occupant
      • modele.occupant.objetMobile.ObjetMobile
        • modele.occupant.objetMobile.Sage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Questionnable

    public class Sage
extends ObjetMobile
    The `Sage` class is a subclass of `ObjetMobile` that has a `process` method which redirects non-hunter objects to a random direction and calculates the direction for a hunter object towards the treasure.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void process(ObjetMobile h)
      The function redirects an object towards the treasure if it is a hunter, otherwise it sets a random direction.

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public void process(ObjetMobile h)
        The function redirects an object towards the treasure if it is a hunter, otherwise it sets a random direction.
        Parameters:
        h - The parameter "h" is an object of type ObjetMobile, which represents a mobile object in the game. The method "process" takes this object as a parameter and performs certain actions based on its type. If the object is not an instance of the Hunter class, it is redirected to a
